inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getPrincipalApplicationAssignments.

applicationAssignments.description: List of principals assigned to the application. See the `application_assignments` attribute reference below.

instanceArn.description: ARN of the instance of IAM Identity Center.

principalId.description: An identifier for an object in IAM Identity Center, such as a user or group.

principalType.description: Entity type for which the assignment will be created. Valid values are `USER` or `GROUP`.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getPrincipalApplicationAssignments.

applicationAssignments.description: List of principals assigned to the application. See the `application_assignments` attribute reference below.

principalId.description: An identifier for an object in IAM Identity Center, such as a user or group.

principalType.description: Entity type for which the assignment will be created. Valid values are `USER` or `GROUP`.
